thumb.title: 宇宙空母ギャラクティカ デッドロック：感電シリーズ II エピソード 2 - ピコン出身の少女 日本語版
thumb.description: The commander assigned Galactica a new supply route, but not alone with the escort fleet. A new ship girl joins Galactica's support. The Cylons continue to sabotage the Colonial supply routes under Natalie's command, but one of them has taken a horrific action that could have a significant impact on operations behind Colonial territory. Music Used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8cf_H0phwgI&list=PLjQOEieyPFmMVwqB3XuR9jQv6wmWTl608&index=14 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQTxukBTxNQ&list=PLnLRHqfmQi1tirJGKiJfNa6NZmVCTI3SC&index=2 https://commons.nicovideo.jp/works/nc103948 h ttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wZ5eYoVwY4&list=PLjQOEieyPFmMVwqB3XuR9jQv6wmWTl608&index=35 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GL_4_2sIiqY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M5VWv-sgVB4 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Puc4Fo6NB9w Illustration: SydusArts, Mobius, Fleevseon The rooms are here https://animelandscape.blogspot.com/2 .... I borrowed it from.
